joint_involvement.justification: 1-3 small joints (2nd-5th MTPs, thumb IPs, wrists) + 4-10 large joints (shoulders, elbows, hips, knees)

serology.justification: RF negative and anti-CCP/ACPA not mentioned

acute_phase.justification: CRP normal (value: 3 mg/L) < CRP threshold of 10 mg/L; ESR is unknown but VHS value provided (20 mm/h). Since no inflammatory markers are elevated and CRP is normal, this category scores as 0 points.

duration.justification: No mention of duration or treatment history

treatment_context.justification: No indication of DMARD use in the provided facts.

classification_rationale: The patient meets criteria for ACR/EULAR RA, but has no serological evidence (both RF and anti-CCP are negative) and no inflammatory markers indicating systemic inflammation. Therefore, based on the provided guidelines, this score is insufficient to classify as definite RA (6/10 points total).
